title: Chapter 1488 - Five Aggregates Stone
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1488 - Five Aggregates Stone

In the Second Battleground, everyone was in the Dao Integration Realm. That made the rules of the hunt fair.

Besides, this was the Western Chill Star Domain’s main base, and there were numerous Dao Integration experts around eyeing Su Yi hungrily.

Even if they couldn’t beat him, they could just seek refuge within Western Chill City.

It was for this reason that the Dao Integration experts were all eager to get to him first. Furthermore, they were completely fearless, with no reservations whatsoever.

All they could think about was beating their competition to the punch. They wanted to see who could kill their prey first!

The life and death of their target didn’t matter, but the competition was thrilling.

This was the joy of hunting!

Alas, although they didn’t know it, even though their prey’s cultivation was on par with theirs, his strength…

Was enough to cut down immortals in the Human Realm!

Su Yi’s eyes shone with a hint of mockery. He waved his sleeves, and…

Boom!

The seven Dao Integration cultivators rushing at him from all sides exploded with a bang, their bodies exploding into bits. Blood and flesh sprayed in all directions.
